title: Thrashing
subject: Operating Systems
theory: If a process doesn't have enough frames, it page faults constantly. OS sees low CPU usage (waiting for disk) and adds MORE processes, making it worse. System spends 100% time paging, 0% working.

real_world_use_cases.description: Opening too many tabs on low RAM. Mouse lags, disk grinds.

summary: When the system collapses under memory pressure.
